name: Brazilian Body Wave
description:
Our Brazilian Body Wave is naturally full of waves and body compared to other textures. The hair can be straightened, styled, curled and them back to its natural state, hence it being the most flexible of them all.

About Hair: 
Virgin Brazilian Hair is the finest quality Brazilian Human hair available. All Virgin Brazilian Hair has undergone a stringent quality assurance to ensure it is free of imperfections. Each bundle of Virgin Brazilian Hair is 3.5-4 ounces and available in a Natural Brown/Black. With proper care, hair lasts 6 months - 1 year +.

How Many Bundles Are Required For A Full Head? 
16" OR Shorter = 8oz [ 2 Bundles ] 
18"-26" = 12oz [ 3 Bundles ] 
28" and Longer = 16oz [ 4 Bundles ]

Lengths: 12" - 32"

ALL PRE-ORDERS WILL BE MAILED ON MAY 13!!!

SHIPPING TAKES: 5-7 Business Days (Not Including Holidays or Weekends)

name: Brazilian Deep Wave
description:
Looking for some juicy curls? Then look no further than to our Brazilian curly. It is naturally formatted with tight small curls that soothes any hair texture. Hair can be straightened curled & styled, then back to its natural state.

About Hair: 
Virgin Brazilian Hair is the finest quality Brazilian Human hair available. All Virgin Brazilian Hair has undergone a stringent quality assurance to ensure it is free of imperfections. Each bundle of Virgin Brazilian Hair is 3.5-4 ounces and available in a Natural Black/Brown color. With proper care, hair lasts 6 months - 1 year +.

How Many Bundles Are Required For A Full Head? 
16" OR Shorter = 8oz [ 2 Bundles ] 
18"-26" = 12oz [ 3 Bundles ] 
28" and Longer = 16oz [ 4 Bundles ]

Lengths: 12" - 32"

ALL PRE-ORDERS WILL BE MAILED ON MAY 13!!!

name: Malaysian
description:
Our Malaysian is soft & silky in texture. It is full of natural wave patterns. Hair can be straightened for a more bone straight look, hair can also be curled and styled.

About Hair: 
Virgin Malaysian Hair is the finest quality Malaysian Human hair available. All Virgin Malaysian Hair has undergone a stringent quality assurance to ensure it is free of imperfections. Each bundle of Virgin Malaysian Hair is 3.5-4 ounces and available in a Natural Black/Brown color. With proper care, hair lasts 1-2 years.

How Many Bundles Are Required For A Full Head? 
16" OR Shorter = 8oz 
18"-26" = 12oz 
28" and Longer = 16oz

Lengths: 12" - 32"

ALL PRE-ORDERS WILL BE MAILED ON MAY 13!!!

SHIPPING TAKES: 5-7 Business Days (Not Including Holidays or Weekends)
